original_text: I have seen the difficult work that God has given people to do. He has caused them to be very busy. I have seen the difficult work that God has given people to do. He has caused them to be very busy.
korean_text: 하나님이 인생들에게 노고를 주사 애쓰게 하신 것을 내가 보았노라

sentences.original_text: I have seen the difficult work
that God has given people to do
He has caused them to be very busy

that God has given people to do
He has caused them to be very busy
